main event: A bright, whitish object was observed gliding with a wobbling motion over Bedford, Ohio on October 24, 1963.
interesting points: The object was estimated to travel at speeds of 2,500 mph.,The duration of the observation was between 15-20 seconds.,No visible source of propulsion or structure was evident.,The object flashed and flickered in the sky.,A handwritten response described it as very bright and appearing to hover silently.
